experience.title: Account Relationship Manager
experience.description: An Account Relationship Manager at TimelyAi typically oversees client relationships, acting as a liaison between the company and its customers. Responsibilities often involve understanding client needs, strategizing solutions, nurturing partnerships, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Also collaborate with various internal teams to deliver services, address concerns, and explore opportunities for growth.

experience.title: Brand Marketing Intern
experience.description: During my marketing internship at OBe Cocktails, I was responsible for developing and implementing effective marketing strategies to increase brand awareness. This involved working closely with influencers to develop and execute successful campaigns that targeted the right audiences.I gained valuable experience in marketing strategy development and campaign execution, as well as in coordinating and collaborating with influencers. Through my work, I developed a deep understanding of the importance of effective communication, as well as the need to stay up-to-date with market trends and consumer behavior.

experience.title: Marketing Team
experience.description: As an intern in the performance marketing sector of a startup FMCG company, I conducted analysis of all marketing campaigns, evaluating their suitability and relevance to the company. This involved utilizing data analysis tools and market research to inform the decision-making process. Through this experience, I developed valuable skills in data analysis, decision-making, and marketing strategy that I can apply to future roles in the industry.This involved working closely with the marketing team to ensure that campaigns were targeted effectively, and that resources were being used efficiently. Through my work, I developed strong analytical skills and a deep understanding of the marketing industry.
